basics.name: Allesandra F. Sams-Jones
basics.label: Consultant
basics.summary: I have a B.S. in Business Administration from Sullivan University and I'm studing for an A.S. in Information Technology from Sullivan University. I expect to graduate in Summer, 2022.

work.summary: Data and reporting consultant for Retail Claims Organization
highlights: Provide ad hoc reports via SQl, TOAD, and Netezza based on various parameters for entire Retail Claims Organization leadership team
Ensure VIP claims (politicians, high-level retired executives) are processed correctly
Design and maintain several database for departments across the organization
Administrator/Trainer for a production monitoring tool that gathers production data for 700+ associates
Administrator and creator of several SharePoint sites for the Retail Claims Organization
Worked with Claims Process Organization to ensure that claims processes functioned in the manner intended
Identified impacts to the claims organization for new or updated processes
Identified areas of improvement within the claims process for multiple teams
Identified cost savings related to productivity or quality improvements

work.summary: Supervisor for multiple production teams with as many as 38 direct reports at one time
highlights: Ensured appropriate staffing levels were achieved to ensure resources are managed effectively
Identified and analyzed variation in individual performance metrics and proactively worked to remove barriers and improve performance
Built several inventory tools to increase efficiency of pend aging reporting for peers.
Designed and maintained a peer review database that has saved more than $9,000,000 in under- and overpayments since its inception in 2010
Designed and maintained multiple database for several teams across the organization including databases for work from acquired companies
Lead several projects that reduced administrative costs by hundreds of thousands of dollars

work.summary: Served as administrative assistant to two pastors for a congregation of over 500 people
highlights: Managed accounts receivables by entering member contributions into a software program for an accurate accounting of funds
Managed accounts payables by organizing bills for timely payment and writing checks
Creator, designer and former webmaster of Newcovenantbc.org, the church’s official website
Designed and operated audio/visual enhancements on multiple plasma screens throughout the facility during weekly worship experience using Sunday Plus software
Responsible for assisting adjusters with complex claims issues and helping them resolve them appropriately
Coordinated unit huddles and disseminated processing information through huddle documents and quick reference guides that I create
Performed root cause analysis coupled with tracking and trending of various claims issues
Responded to market requests for claims reprocessing and investigation
Completed accurate and timely adjudication of complex claims
Handled customer service duties (answered calls from members and providers, ordered id cards, resolving claims issues, etc.)
Carried out accurate and timely completion of numerous complex special projects
Acted as team lead for one year in the absence of official team lead
	Keyed claims into data entry system with high degree of accuracy while maintaining quantitative standards
	Trained new associates on the data entry system

awards.title: Multiple STAR Award recipient
awards.summary: STAR Awards are granted to associates who significantly reduce administrative cost by improving productivity, quality, etc.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: I received this after my first semester for making all As while carrying a full course load. .
